data.name: Branch_Device_Settings
data.script:
config system global
set hostname $(hostname)
end
config system interface
edit wan1.vlan10
        set vdom "root"
        set allowaccess ping
        set role wan
        set interface "wan1"
        set vlanid 10
        set ip $(WAN_IP:4,+1) 255.255.255.252
    next
edit internal
        set vdom "root"
        set allowaccess ping ssh http https
        set role lan
        set ip $(LAN_IP)
    next
end

data.name: test
data.script:
config system global
set hostname "fgt1"
end
